title: Protesting during a pandemic
description:
Thousands of people have taken the streets to protest during a pandemic. Vox.com's Brian Resnick explains why not all public health experts think that's a bad thing.

Featuring
Brian Resnick (@B_resnick)

Links to resources discussed:
What public health experts want critics to know about why they support the protests
Tear gas, explained

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
